Comments: cd: Crohn's disease, uc: Ulcerative colitis, ibdu: Inflammatory bowel disease unclassified, hc: healthy controls, non-ibd: other medical diagnosis possible so not entirely healthy, await_dx: awaiting diagnostic confirmation
L1: ileal only disease, L2: colonic only, L3: ileocolonic involvement
L1: non-stricturing, non-penetrating, L2: stricturing disease, L3: penetrating disease
S1: mild activity, S2: moderate activity, S3: severe activity (search Montreal UC for full definitions)
E1: proctitis only, E2: left-sided disease, E3: extensive
This field previously known as incident_case in mini-music and bl_new_diagnosis in gi-damps
